title: Install Token Optimizer
description:
Set up token optimization system to reduce API costs and improve efficiency:

1. Research token optimization strategies
2. Implement caching layer for common prompts
3. Add token counting and monitoring
4. Create cost alerts when approaching budget limits
5. Test with production workloads
